Name: SquidProxy
Author: Microsoft - support@microsoft.com
Description:
The [Squid Proxy](http://www.squid-cache.org/) solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest Squid Proxy logs into Microsoft Sentinel.

 This solution is dependent on the Custom logs via AMA connector to collect the logs. The Custom logs solution will be installed as part of this solution installation.

 **NOTE**: Microsoft recommends installation of Custom logs via AMA Connector. Legacy connector uses the Log Analytics agent which is about to be deprecated by Aug 31, 2024. Using MMA and AMA on same machine can cause log duplication and extra ingestion cost [more details](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/ama-migrate).
